mapper.select: SELECT R.ROUTE_NUM , R.USER_NUM , U.NAME , U.PROFILE, R.DALANT , R.CONTENT , R.WRITE_DT FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN USERS U ON (R.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM) WHERE ROUTE_NUM IN ( SELECT ROUTE_NUM FROM ROUTE WHERE USER_NUM = #{userId} ) ORDER BY WRITE_DT DESC
SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE USER_NUM = #{userId} ORDER BY NOTICE_DT DESC
